Class Player

java.lang.Object
  Creature
      Player

public class Player
extends Creature

The player character The plan is to refactor 'player' into an 'alive' abstract class and have 'player' and 'monster' extend it

Version:
18/10/12
Author:
Micheal, Matthew Smith, Denis Dionne
